description: Get details for the specified image lifecycle policy.

parameters.name: lifecyclePolicyArn
parameters.description: Specifies the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the image lifecycle policy resource to get.

nested_items.name: lifecyclePolicy
nested_items.description: The ARN of the image lifecycle policy resource that was returned.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the lifecycle policy resource.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the lifecycle policy.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: Optional description for the lifecycle policy.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the lifecycle policy resource is enabled.

nested_items.name: executionRole
nested_items.description: The name or Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role that Image Builder uses to run the lifecycle policy. This is a custom role that you create.

nested_items.name: resourceType
nested_items.description: The type of resources the lifecycle policy targets.

nested_items.name: policyDetails
nested_items.description: The configuration details for a lifecycle policy resource.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: Specifies the lifecycle action to take.

nested_items.name: includeResources
nested_items.description: Specifies the resources that the lifecycle policy applies to.

nested_items.name: amis
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the lifecycle action should apply to distributed AMIs.

nested_items.name: snapshots
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the lifecycle action should apply to snapshots associated with distributed AMIs.

nested_items.name: containers
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the lifecycle action should apply to distributed containers.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: Filter resources based on either age or count.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The number of units for the time period or for the count. For example, a value of 6 might refer to six months or six AMIs.

nested_items.name: unit
nested_items.description: Defines the unit of time that the lifecycle policy uses to determine impacted resources. This is required for age-based rules.

nested_items.name: retainAtLeast
nested_items.description: For age-based filters, this is the number of resources to keep on hand after the lifecycle DELETE action is applied. Impacted resources are only deleted if you have more than this number of resources. If you have fewer resources than this number, the impacted resource is not deleted.

nested_items.name: exclusionRules
nested_items.description: Additional rules to specify resources that should be exempt from policy actions.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: isPublic
nested_items.description: Configures whether public AMIs are excluded from the lifecycle action.

nested_items.name: regions
nested_items.description: Configures Amazon Web Services Regions that are excluded from the lifecycle action.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: sharedAccounts
nested_items.description: Specifies Amazon Web Services accounts whose resources are excluded from the lifecycle action.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: lastLaunched
nested_items.description: Specifies configuration details for Image Builder to exclude the most recent resources from lifecycle actions.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The integer number of units for the time period. For example 6 (months).

nested_items.name: unit
nested_items.description: Defines the unit of time that the lifecycle policy uses to calculate elapsed time since the last instance launched from the AMI. For example: days, weeks, months, or years.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: resourceSelection
nested_items.description: Resource selection criteria used to run the lifecycle policy.

nested_items.name: recipes
nested_items.description: A list of recipes that are used as selection criteria for the output images that the lifecycle policy applies to.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of an Image Builder recipe that the lifecycle policy uses for resource selection.

nested_items.name: semanticVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the Image Builder recipe specified by the name field.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: dateCreated
nested_items.description: The timestamp when Image Builder created the lifecycle policy resource.

nested_items.name: dateUpdated
nested_items.description: The timestamp when Image Builder updated the lifecycle policy resource.

nested_items.name: dateLastRun
nested_items.description: The timestamp for the last time Image Builder ran the lifecycle policy.
(string) ---
(string) ---
